t: PBS and Amazon to Launch Local PBS Stations and PBS KIDS FAST Channels
s: November 14, 2024 - Non-Prime users will have free access to PBS programming under the “Watch for Free” section within Prime Video.  · “PBS member stations will be able to tap into a leading streaming service to offer quality local programming viewers know and love for free,” said PBS Chief Digital and ...

t: Watching PBS videos on other streaming services. : PBS Help
s: Full-length episodes and clips from PBS KIDS series are also available for free on PBS KIDS’ station-branded, localized streaming video platforms, including: pbskids.org; the PBS KIDS Video App, which is accessible on a variety of mobile devices and platforms; and PBS KIDS station web players.

t: AWS Innovator: PBS | Case Studies, Videos and Customer Stories
s: PBS innovates using AWS to bring its annual Short Film Festival to a virtual reality format, improve the performance of video streams, and enhance its archives with deep search functionality and more using artificial intelligence.

t: PBS Local Stations, Kids, Drama and Documentary FAST Channels Added to Amazon’s Prime Video Offerings
